name: 3D Off-Road Truck Parking 2- Extreme 4x4 Simulator
description:
450,000 Downloads! Thank you so much!

It's back and better than ever! Experience the thrill of taking a real off-road truck out on the trail. The goal is simple. Park your truck at the end of the level. Sounds easy but fiendish traps, explosive barrels and deadly cliffs stand in the way of you and success. Do you have what it takes to strap in and take on mother nature? Earn money and upgrade your truck. Buy new trucks to ensure that you can take on the toughest challenge. An awesome experience is waiting for you. This game is not for the weak. Real drivers wanted.

Features:
• Realistic terrain environments
• 12 unique levels with all types of terrain
• 2 Unlockable Sandbox levels to explore
• 6 incredible off-road vehicles
• Change colors and upgrade your ride
• Unique and deadly obstacles in each level
• Video replay – Share with your friends

Compatiblity Note: Due to high quality 3D graphics, this game requires 1024 mb of ram and may not run on older devices. Recommended iPad 3 and up and iPhone 5 and up.
